text: Ākāśamaṇḍalata yi āchē ārau pr̥thiraīta yi āchē sē'i sakalō āllāharaē'i, tōmālōkara pūrbē yisakalaka kitāba diẏā haichila siham̐taka ārau tōmālōkakō nirdēśa dichō yē, tōmālōkē āllāhara tākbaraā aralambana karaā. Ārau yadi tōmālōkē kupharaī karaā tathāpi'ō ākāśamaṇḍalata yi āchē ārau pr̥thiraīta yi āchē sē'i sakalō āllāharaē'i, āllāha abhāramukta, praśansita
